first1: Karayev Umedjon is a <font class='main-color'>front-end</font> and <font class='main-color'>back-end</font> developer

quote: With great power comes greet electricity bill
about-me-intro: I’m a backend developer and IT enthusiast based in Termez, Uzbekistan. I specialize in building functional and efficient web applications using Laravel, PHP, MySQL, and SQLite. Additionally, I work with Vite and React to create modern and interactive front-end experiences.
about-me-intro-2: Creating innovative and practical solutions has been my passion for years. I continuously explore new technologies and frameworks to improve my skills and develop high-quality digital products.
freelance_interest: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
